breathing.title: Breathing Measurement
breathing.introDescription:
Measure accurate breathing rate through facial recognition
and manage healthy breathing patterns
breathing.startMeasurementDescription: Measure breathing rate in real-time by recognizing your face
breathing.viewStatisticsDescription: Check and analyze daily, weekly, and monthly breathing patterns

measurementWarnings.title: Precautions During Measurement
measurementWarnings.item1: • Please refrain from moving during measurement
measurementWarnings.item2: • Please measure in a bright place
measurementWarnings.item3: • Please maintain an appropriate distance between the camera and your face
measurementWarnings.item4: • This service is not a medical device

guide.title: Refrain from Movement During Measurement
guide.subtitle:
Position your face within the circular area
and measure in a bright place
guide.warning: If the camera and face are too close, measurement may not work

active.instruction:
Position your face within the circular frame
and breathe naturally

result.infoText:
The measurement results were analyzed with more than 95% accuracy through DeepMedi
and received KCL certification test results.
result.disclaimer: ※ This service is not a medical device and is not intended for diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of diseases.

emptyState.title: Please measure breathing for at least 3 days.
emptyState.subtitle: More data is needed for accurate statistics.

step1.title: Sit Down
step1.description: Please sit down and measure calmly during measurement

step2.title: Position Face in Circle
step2.description: Position your face in the circle and start measurement

risk.title: Cardiovascular Health Risk
risk.message:
To accurately measure cardiovascular health risk,
please self-diagnose chronic diseases and diet/lifestyle items

diagnosis.question1: What conditions are you currently taking medication for or managing for more than 3 months?
diagnosis.question1Note: *If none, click the 'None of the above' button below
diagnosis.question3: Are there any symptoms that your family is currently suffering from?
diagnosis.question3Note: *If 2 or more immediate family members or cousins have the same disease

questions.1: Q How often do you eat flour-based foods?
questions.1Description: *Noodles, bread, sujebi, dumplings, hamburgers, pizza, pasta, ramen, fast food, etc.
questions.2: Q How often do you eat fried or stir-fried dishes?
questions.3: Q How often do you consume high-fat meals?
questions.3Description: *Fatty meats, organ meats, smoked meats, bacon, ham, butter, palm oil, coconut oil, etc.
questions.4: Q Do you enjoy drinking carbonated beverages (cola, cider, soda, etc.)?
questions.4Description: *Including ion drinks, sweetened milk, energy drinks, zero drinks, etc.
questions.5: Q How much soup-based food do you usually consume?
questions.6: Q How often do you consume protein meals?
questions.6Description: *Lean meats, eggs, tofu, beans, milk, fat-free red meats, etc.
questions.7: Q Do you frequently consume vegetable dishes and raw vegetables with every meal?
